directions: Whip peanut butter, shortening, and vanilla together in a mixing bowl until well blended. Add powdered sugar and soy milk; mix until light and fluffy. If mixture is too thick, add 1 tablespoon soy milk at a time until creamy and spreadable.
ingredients: ¼ cup soy milk, or more as needed
title: Vegan Fluffy Peanut Butter Frosting
